newsitem.title: USA: US Stockpile nickel bids range $2.8831-$3.0319/lb.
newsitem.headline: US Stockpile nickel bids range $2.8831-$3.0319/lb.

text.p: Bids for the upcoming nickel sale by the U.S. Defense National Stockpile Center ranged between $2.8831 and $3.0319 a lb, the agency said.
Allied Deals was the low bidder, while Keywell was the high bidder.
Other bidders included Considar, S. Wilcoff & Sons, National Nickel Alloy, OmniSource Corp, Thalheimer Bros, Abbey Corp, BenMet, and RMT Metal.
The winners are expected to be announced Thursday or Friday.
The LME provisional closing cash price was $2.9982 a lb.
